website_summaries.verdict: This is like "hair magic." Makes you look like you're having a good hair day after one application.
pros: Great for root touch-ups, thinning hairlines, and bald spots
Offers confidence, since you look like you have thicker, fuller hair
cons: Colors may not match with own well
Takes few times to get application down pat
Product may thin out after sweating
Sometimes feels like it has a gritty texture

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff and wish I would have found it sooner! I’ve been using it for about 2 years and no one has ever noticed. I’ve even gotten some friends and family members hooked, too. It’s so easy to apply and stays in place all day. I used to be extremely self conscious about my thin spots and would spend a lot of time strategically placing my hair to cover them up, and finish with loads of hairspray so my hair wouldn’t move. I mean, I wish I had all my natural hair, but this is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Topik in an XFusion bottle?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a loyal fan of XFusion for about 7 years. I’ve tried Topik too and it’s not nearly as good quality - it falls like dust that doesn’t actually adhere to your hair or scalp. But recently I’ve noticed that the XFusion I’ve purchased in the later part of 2017 to early 2018 doesn’t have the same quality as the regular XFusion. It feels just like Topik...perhaps because XFusion is owned by Topik now? Whatever the reason it’s not the same product I’ve used and loved for years. It’s Topik quality powder at a higher price than Topik
customer_reviews.author: DeeAy

customer_reviews.title: Is too powdery and fine and will seep into your scalp- NEEDS IMPROVED or ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this product 3 times no issue 4th time it burned a hole in the crown of my head had to go to the Drs to get a steroid cream just to stop the pain. Is too powdery and fine and will seep into your scalp- NEEDS IMPROVED or taken off the market
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Dawson

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but the price has gone up $20 ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but the price has gone up $20 in the last month. Will have to consider an alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W.

customer_reviews.title: Buying it again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. As I age (I'm 44) my hair has thinned. I have naturally light blond hair but color it darker to add the illusion of thinker hair so I like the medium brown best. It also allows for great coverage of the blond/grayling regrowth in between coloring. There is a learning curve to applying to your hair, I tap the applicator directly on my scalp. I find if I shake it onto my hair it applies too much. Before and after photo attached.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Van Bibber

customer_reviews.title: Wow, it’s miraculous for thin, fine hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Finally a product for fine, thin hair like mine!!! I actually purchased a wig because I was so self-conscious about my thinning hair.... but then my stylist recommended XFusion. It’s miraculous!! Worth every penny and it goes a long way! I sprinkle on a generous amount, gently work it in and then tease my hair. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Like this product but out seemed to have changed down the line...
customer_reviews.text: Like this product but out seemed to have changed down the line??? Not sure why they change it? It seems like all of this kind of product has The same issue, different and sometimes not until about mid container. The last one I purchased I got to use some, not all of and appeared different then previously. Not consistent in quality.. At some points my hair seemed to fall out from it and sores appeared on my head?
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Creeden

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: I have Lupus and had a really bad flare which caused a lot of my hair to fall out. A lot as in I was bald in a few spots. I had seen the video for this and really didn't think it would work that great. But it did! It worked better than I could even imagine. It covered up my bald spots and made it blend in with my hair that I had. It didn't come off at the gym. And it never flaked throughout the day. If you were losing your hair you definitely need this product.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: ... normally don't write reviews unless I really fall in love with the product I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews unless I really fall in love with the product I purchased. And this is one of those that I wanted to write a review. You can call this magic or anything you like, but it is worth every penny you spend. If you have a thinning hair (not complete baldness) this will do the job to get you full hair look. I wish I discovered this earlier. Highly recommended. Note: hold it very close to your head when you sprinkle, otherwise, it is very tiny and will disburse in the air and you will breathe into your lungs. I am thinking of using hair spray after I sprinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Searcher

customer_reviews.title: Good product and results.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in medium brown. It is very dark but still worked. I also purchased the spray applicator which makes all the difference. Without the applicator you are shaking the product with less control of where it goes and wasting the powder. I would highly recommend the spray applicator along with the fibers. Personally, I feel this is only beneficial for those with mild to moderate hair loss/patches.
customer_reviews.author: MilleG

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! I’ve used the darker colors I’m the past ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I’ve used the darker colors I’m the past and u can see it on the scalp but since I’ve gone grey i decided to try it again and i swear u can not see my scalp anymore! I got the white and the grey the grey works the best i also Got the atomizer and i feel that makes a big difference on the application.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B

customer_reviews.title: This xFusion not the same as previously purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have used Xfusion for a couple of years. This bottle was purchased in November of 2017. It is distinctly different than the others. It is more like a powder than fibers and gives patchy coverage. It does not adhere to the scalp well. Now one of two things have happened, either the manufacturer changed the formula or this is not the real product. Quality is totally absent. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: THOSE 5 STAR REVIEWS HAVE TO BE PHONY. Take this test!
customer_reviews.text: First I ordered medium brown and what came was a bottle that the bar code had black sharper line through it and when I shook it on my part it looked like dark brown-black Here’s the test to prove the product doesn’t work at at. Shake some on the hairs of your arm wait a few minutes and rub it gently... EVERY BIT OF THE POWDER DISAPPEARS LEAVING YOUR SKIN AND HAIRS EXACTLY AS THEY WERE BEFORE!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product anymore.
customer_reviews.text: The xFusion product used to be very good as compared to the Toppik product. But recently I've seen the product go down in quality very sharply. I have a request to the company.... Please don't change the original Xfusion that I have been using for the last 7 years. The new product is exactly a cheaper version that you can get from anywhere and not the original xFusion.
customer_reviews.author: Atif Sarfraz

customer_reviews.title: Life changer.
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to try this product for a number of reasons, but I'm extremely grateful I finally did. I'm only 27 years old, but have been trying to deal with thinning hair for almost a decade already. After trying so many things to help my hair, from diets to shampoos to medication, it's almost impossible to fight against genetics. I'm sure one day I'll still have to dive into the shaved head look, but until then this product has given me my confidence back, almost completely removed the thinning hair anxiety that I'm sure so many men reading this can understand. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Danny P.

customer_reviews.title: Xfusion Keratin Hair Fiber
customer_reviews.text: With using XFusion I am able to leave my house and know that people won't be staring at my lack of hair. This product is easily applied and remains in place until I wash it out. At times the spray applicator clogs and needs to be "tapped" on the sink to be cleared. Not a problem. It comes in a variety of colors; the dark brown blends perfectly with my hair. It's amazing what a small amount of this product can do to make a dramatic difference in my appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie K

customer_reviews.title: I had super low (somewhere south of hell) expectation for the XFusion ...
customer_reviews.text: I had super low (somewhere south of hell) expectation for the XFusion hair fibers. I decided to sprinkle some on my palm and I wasn't impressed. I went ahead and sprinkled some on my problems, I almost made the mistake of over sprinkling but then I noticed I wasn't sure where to sprinkle gazooks it worked. Next step ask an eagle eyed observer (my sister) and she was surprised (told me to buy stock in the company) The only challenge is buying the right hair color not to light not to dark but hey life isn't easy.
customer_reviews.author: LEJTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, covers gray and thinning spots well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these hair fibers for several years. I've tried sprays, gels applied with a mascara-type wand, powders (e.g., Joan Rivers), but none of them has been as good as the X-Fusion Keratin Hair Fibers at covering gray and, more importantly, thinning areas where my scalp is visible. For me, getting the spray applicator attachment has made all the difference. If I just shake on the fibers, they get all over my forehead and look blotchy over thinning areas. The spray applicator attachment provides even, targeted coverage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schindel

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this hair fiber product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my forever hair fibers product! Matches great, a little goes a long way and my husband says, you cannot tell and I know he would let me know.
customer_reviews.author: MikkifrAZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended this product and she gave me a free sample to try. I fell in love with it! I have a lot of very thinning spots and it covers them wonderfully. I read in one review that you need hair for it to cling to but I have found that to be untrue. It totally covers my very thinning part line just by clinging to my scalp. And it does a great job of covering my other very thin spots. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: will buy again for sure
customer_reviews.text: ive never used this before and it is amazing. I did get the topper and do recommend that. I also got the hairline thing and really like it. I did buy the setting spray and really don't notice a difference with that as far as it staying. The fibers last all day. This has given me so much more confidence!!
customer_reviews.author: Mule girl

customer_reviews.title: Although this stuff is an absolute life saver. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this stuff is an absolute life saver. I have used it daily for years and wont leave the house without it. However, with their NEW price tag of $70 is outrageous, they lost a customer. The cost raise is absolutely outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product provides excellent coverage for thinning hair. I purchased both the dark brown and medium brown, and found the dark brown worked best for the coverage I needed. I highly recommend using the Applicator. I've used other products and their applicator, and XFusion exceeds them.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleS

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE, SWEATS GREEN!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is a knock off product or what but it's HORRIBLE!! I have used fibers for many years, including this brand. I have hopped between and this time around this product pissed me off!! I was on the beach 4th of July weekend, 90 some degrees, sweating...no big deal everyone was. The big deal is my sweat was dark green!!! MORTIFIED!!!!!! OMG, can you imagine, pity smiles until someone told me my "product appears to be melting green" I looked the the grinch!!!!! If i could throw this product at the retailer i would!!! Never have I ever been so upset!! It made me give them a star!🙄
customer_reviews.author: BMH

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product for thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for thinning hair. just a word of warning, don't put your sunglasses on top of your head then back on your face. You will have brown marks on your face. Ask me how I know... Ugh. Wish it stayed on better, but it does make the hair appear fuller. Oh, and if you brush your hair after you apply, it will leave lines on your scalp so apply when your hairstyle is totally done,
customer_reviews.author: M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Aweful product!
customer_reviews.text: Why do so many people say this is good? It moves within ten minutes. It leaves patches that look awful on my head. It all shifts to my forehead and made lint balls. The lint balls were so bad I could comb them out. I am experienced with these products for many years. Ion is way better but got rid of light brown. I am so sad that I cannot use light brown. I'm not going to waste my money on this product though not worth it. I will just buy the dark brown Ion than risk this mess and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: amanda downing

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Toppik
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell, these fibers are just as good as the regular Toppik fibers at a fraction of the cost. The look is natural and they hold in place the same way. The Toppik spray adapter fits on this bottle as well. I have tried this with and without the applicator bulb and the dispersion is definitely easier and more even with the applicator bulb. I also use the spray to hold the fibers in place. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but so small!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, but I should have paid more attention to just how small the container was-it's REALLY tiny! I would recommend the product long as you use a setting spray with it. (That is the only reason i gave it four stars) I would NOT recommend getting the small size as it is not worth the money. (I almost missed the container in the packaging because it is that small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will always be in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I have very very thin hair. This really works. When I mention to people that my hair is super thin they look at me and my hair and say they can't see that. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: etc

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Love the product, but when I couldn't find my go-to size I ordered this to tide me over. I suppose I COULD have pulled out a tape measure and verified the size but really, who would? It is smaller than shown in the 'finger' photo, and absolutely NOT worth even bothering with. The product is awesome, but this size is ridiculous and misleading. Buy it from another seller. I DO highly recommend the product, just not from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hope

customer_reviews.title: XFusion Keratin Hair Fibers - It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for a thinning areas at my hair line and part line. Can't tell it's in there. So happy and relieved to have found this product
customer_reviews.author: Lafoxa

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product has really saved me from looking bald. My hair started thinning and now it is REALLY noticeable on top, with skin showing through. This works very well and most people have no idea that I am balding. It washes out, so you have to use after each shampoo, but it is well worth it. It goes a long way. Buy a shade lighter than you need.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Person

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this product. I have alopecia and lost close to half of my hair. This product hid all of the spots perfectly - no one could tell. It helped with my confidence, which in turn reduced my stress levels which were contributing to the hair loss. I wish I could tell everyone about this. If you are even considering this, try it. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Amin

customer_reviews.title: Not a great solution!
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a long review. I am an older blonde woman with sparse hair in my temple area and hairline. This is a horrible situation to deal with. I have tried several fiber products and I don’t love any of them. Even with hairline optimizer the fibers fall all over the place. They are shiny and don’t look natural and you need a separate product to spray them in place. I think they probably work better for men and brunettes. I found that using a brown fill-in powder by Clarol works the best. It comes with a blunt end brush and it is better than these fibers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer.p cohen

customer_reviews.title: No bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Be aware this fiber will not stay on scalp, I use a blow dryer everyday, all day, it blows right off, plus my scalp itches all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Technically they work but....
customer_reviews.text: I will attest to several other reviews on this product.. They technically work but the colors are way off. What the picture looks like and what you get are vastly different (at least for me). I still tried them and as I said they do technically work like they are supposed to but the color contrast was too great with my natural hair color to be able to use it in public. Effective product but good luck finding the right color!
customer_reviews.author: razorguy

customer_reviews.title: I'm not kidding!  This works!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews...never. But, I am in this instance because this product is wonderful. All my self-consciousness about my thinning hair went "poof" when I applied the fibers. I spray a light holding hairspray on the spot/area I want to cover and then (with the pump) apply the fibers. If you are at all self-conscious about your thinnning spots, this is the product for you. I'm serious. This is an amazing product for those of us with thinning hair as we age (or at any age with fine/thin hair).
customer_reviews.author: MEC

customer_reviews.title: Cancer patient - great product
customer_reviews.text: I lost all of my hair during chemo and this product is a quick fix to make me less self-conscious about my hair loss. Literally took 1 minute to sprinkle on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have thin fine hair and it is thin along my part line
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I have thin fine hair and it is thin along my part line. I also have my hair colored, highlighted and lowlighted. I bought a light blond a medium blond and a light brown to see which color world work best. The light brown in this product works best for me. You may have to experiment to find the right color, but at the price of this produce you can, I highly recommend this product. I have had my first container for 6 month and it is not empty yet.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good disguise if you still have hair to work with
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this if you still have fairly decent hair coverage. I have female pattern loss, diffuse over the scalp, not outright bald patches. My hair is long and wavy and lifts up away from my scalp, so the thinning underneath is apparent. I don't want the XFusion directly on my hair, since the texture is dead matte, like talcum powder. So I part my hair and put the fibers on my scalp, and I have enough hair to cover. It blocks light from reflecting off my scalp, which is what I wanted. I don't think this would work well on bare skin patches unless you have super short hair and a way to get the fibers to stick.
customer_reviews.author: BizzyBee

customer_reviews.title: Great product but outrageous price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I've been using it for many years. What I'm disappointed with is the sudden drastic increase in prices. There are cheaper options out there. I have tried some of them but the quality is not the same as this product. What I've been doing is ordering the cheaper ones and using them as touchups and then using this product more sparingly because of the high price.
customer_reviews.author: ms123

customer_reviews.title: It does help!
customer_reviews.text: After chemo 2 different times, I find my hair is thinning in a few splotches. It took a few times to get the right color, but now I know what works. It does help my hair look thicker! I wish manufacturer would provide a option to purchase a few trial sizes in different shades to help consumer determine best shade. It is important to go a little lighter rather than darker than your hair color.
customer_reviews.author: MER

customer_reviews.title: A real Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I have found as I age my hair has thinned a bit especially on top. I pride myself on my hair and did not want to take any chemical treatment. My hairdresser told me about Xfusion and was a customer and I am so grateful to her. I use it everyday-shake a bit here and there on top and anywhere you could see a bit of scalp is gone and it also adds to the body of my hair. I couldn't live without it now. It's a bit pricey but well worth it for the confidence it gives me that I look good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so grateful I found this product online at AMAZON!! Amazon I LOVE you & the array of products you carry. What a superb Company. Thanks. As for this product, it works great. It covers the thinning spots. I have just a spot that is a little thin. That is all I have to do is style my hair, sprinkle the product on the thinning area, then lightly spray my hair with hairspray & it is done.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: great tester size before making a big commitment
customer_reviews.text: great tester size. I've only ever ordered two colors of hair fibers (in the full size) and I have wanted to further mix colors to better match my natural hair color with a reddish tint. Without knowing how red the color would be I kept from spending the $ on a bottle that I might end up not using. This worked very well and helped make the medium brown + light brown mix that I use get that slight red tone that better matched my hair color. Now I know I can order the full size with no regrets and it will be used in my mix.
customer_reviews.author: ahippieadventure

customer_reviews.title: It’s my secret weapon against thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great... I sprinkle some each morning on my hair part and on the crown of my head. It covers the part of my scalp that would otherwise show through and fills in the appearance of my bangs. I’ve always had thin hair but now in my late 40s it’s getting more pronounced. This lets my hair and scalp look like it did when I was young. Been using it for years. Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like it that much. I have only tried one other hair fiber product (caboki); therefore i only have that to compare to. I much prefer Caboki over this. I wish I would have paid the extra money because this is a waste in my opinion. The product has a gritty texture to it. It really doesn't cling to hair that well. It more or less just sits on the scalp. I don't think it looks that natural either. If you sweat at all, it will clump up and become noticeable. Also, when applying it clogs up the holes in bottle, even when i tapped it sideways slightly with my finger. I never had this issue with Caboki.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thinning and this works great. Just tap the back of it with 2 fingers for about 30 seconds and then the scalp is fully covered. Nobody has noticed that I've been using this powder yet. It's hard to see unless you are looking at it from about 1 foot away. Cool stuff, a cheap fix for thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: JustReviewin'

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this product as I have thinning hair and it does help reduce the scalp showing at the part. There just seems there has to be a better way of applying this stuff. The pump comes out in clumps and the sprinkle doesn't come out very well, but I will continue using it as it is better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Covers grey roots in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I do not have time to do a touch-up on my grey roots. It only lasts until you wash your hair and you cannot put your fingers on your scalp or they will have the dark powder on them, so no scratching. It stays put pretty good, no rub off on pillow, etc... The dark blonde color matches just about any shade of brown. When you sprinkle it on your part, MAKE SURE you immediately use the palm of your hand to vigorously rub it in, or it will just fall out.
customer_reviews.author: L Math

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt look natural
customer_reviews.text: My hair started thinning in front. Maybe from stress or from pulling it back in a bunch all summer. So I bought this stuff to cover up the thinning while the biotin I take kicks in. It gets all over my forehead and it looks exactly like what it is. It just looks like I have brown powder on my scalp. Almost looks like clumped up coffee grinds. It doesn't spread well although I follow the instructions. Odd because I bought this a long time ago for my son who's hair is very thin and it worked pretty well. Not sure if they changed the formulated something.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Morse

customer_reviews.title: what a nice product
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I am much older and my hair is gray. this is prefect for that extra covering. Works so well and no one knew I was using it .They thought i was using a new shampoo or conditioner to make my hair much fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Nelda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This was very obvious in my hair. I used it several times and even though it matched my hair in color, I noticed several people looking at my hair as if trying to determine what I had in it!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: i wish the fibers were alittle larger so that when dispensed it doesn't darker your hair so drastically like a clump of velcro
customer_reviews.text: ehh, i wish the fibers were alittle larger so that when dispensed it doesn't darker your hair so drastically like a clump of velcro. ok product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Green Tint Lately
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what happened to XFusion but lately any purchase of this product has had a green tinted brown thats very obvious. I'm not sure if it's old stock thats been sitting and stored improperly but the product is no longer a brown color. Will be switching to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Arch

customer_reviews.title: It does make my thin hair look much better.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years. It does make my thin hair look much better.
customer_reviews.author: pedalpusher

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love XFusion!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love XFusion!!! I have battled thin hair since my early 20's, I was first given a cannister of XFusion by my cousin who is a hairstylist. It has been an answer to prayers!! The confidence that I am given without having to worry about my thin spots shining through at any given moment is wonderful!! I also highly recommend the attachment XFusion has to evenly disperse the fibers...Great product, if you have tried other fillers and been disappointed,,,ABSOLUTELY MUST try XFusion, it will be a game changer for your hair!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Gives me more confidence
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years. There are many brands out there but I like this the best. I have very thin hair on the crown of my head. After styling I spray lightly with an arosole hairspray, let it dry a moment then sprinkle with the fibers. They cling to the hair and settle towards the scalp to camouflage my thinning hair. It brushes out and shampooing also removes it. It does not stain or irritate my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi44

customer_reviews.title: Not the original XFusion
customer_reviews.text: It appears that XFusion was bought out by Toppik? I used XFusion for many years, and the last time I purchased it I noticed it was a very fine powder that does NOT stick to hair like XFusion normally does. It's like a dust that just settles on the scalp and is very noticeable. Even though the name on the packaging is XFusion, I'm guess this is actually formulated by Toppik and is definitely an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: bjl

customer_reviews.title: Fake fibers!
customer_reviews.text: Fibers don’t stay on ! I also received the wrong size but at times like these with the virus and all I just didn’t want to deal with returning it right now! Fibers don’t stay on it leaves patches definitely not cute!! I have tried other brands this one had the worst fibers didn’t last not even an hour that’s why I call them fake fibers ! Having thin hair sucks ! :/
customer_reviews.author: adrianagaona4

customer_reviews.title: but one time my headache was so bad, and then I washed my hair and almost ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this product and overall it does what it is intended to do. My only complaint is that every time I use it, I get a severe headache. I didnt connect the dots at first, but one time my headache was so bad, and then I washed my hair and almost instantly it went away. I had also purchased the xfusion fibers a year ago and had the same problem but never put the two together. I also purchased Toppik and did not have any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy step to add to hair routine, really helps!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It's easy to apply, it remains in place even when I sweat (and I mean like drenching, hour-of-kickboxing sweat), and a bottle lasts me about two months. It adds about 60-90 seconds to my morning routine and pays off all day. Especially with my dark hair and light skin, this product reduces the contrast people would see through thinning hair. Is it perfect? No, but it's the best product I've found and I'll keep using it until I'm ready to embrace full Bruce Willis baldness.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Everett

customer_reviews.title: ... does not say in your hair whatsoever I've got better products over the counter
customer_reviews.text: This product would not stay in my hair I have black spots all over my face all day long try to go shopping every time I moved it would shake it was embarrassing I was at church it literally came down and seeped through my sinuses the stuff does not say in your hair whatsoever I've got better products over the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Schmoll

customer_reviews.title: Yes more hair
customer_reviews.text: Great for filling in areas on your scalp that need a little hair like fibers. Covers excellent. You’ll feel like and look like you have so much more hair. I will continue to buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have been slowly losing a lot of hair in the front since my early twenties. I'm female and so unlike a man, I can't just accept it move on. This stuff is awesome and not only takes the shine off of your exposed scalp, but it fills in the hair great. So much so, with me anyways, it covers up most of the thin hair. Ladies don't be embarrassed by hair loss,use this!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: my mom swears by this filler
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from Amazon and send it to my mom who lives in another city. She's standing on the top of her head and she swears by this product. She says there's another company which makes fibers but this one is the best. I will continue to order this from Amazon for my mom in the future
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Poor Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just cheap looking powder!! There are NO fibers..it chalky cheap and have had ALOT of people comment to me how bad it looks ..BEWARE !!
customer_reviews.author: Huck

customer_reviews.title: Irritated scalp
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for Dad, it burned his scalp. What is in this thing? Caused more hair to fall out, which is what he was trying to cover up in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Bjp

customer_reviews.title: What I love about this product especially since my hair is so ...
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this product especially since my hair is so thin, is the fact that it helps cover my bare scalp while giving the illusion that my hair is fuller and thicker than it really is. I have tried other brands in smaller sized portions for a higher cost, but seriously is a great invention for us with no hair. What I like least about this product is the cost, even though it is cheaper than other brands I've tried, in my opinion it is just very expensive product unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Truchot

customer_reviews.title: Alopecia
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in a light brown for alopecia. I put it primarily on my scalp to reduce the appearance of the skin showing through. I do like this one and compared to the numerous other products I have tried, I will be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tp

customer_reviews.title: Does come off on bedclothes.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a long time, works well to color in thin hair spots. It does come off on the pillowcases, but washes out without staining the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: BOUNCYBELLE

customer_reviews.title: I look like I have thicker hair...I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thin. when my hair stylist fixes my hair, she uses it and spays over my hair to "hold it on my scalp". I've used it for years and told others about it that are so thrilled with this produce!
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great for thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for at least 7 years. If I wasn't using this, I would definitely have to have a wig....I have a lot of thinning and balding. When I use it, (all the time), people think I have thick hair and don't believe me when I tell them how thin it is and how much balding there actually is. Will keep using it as long as I can!
customer_reviews.author: Clay Lady

customer_reviews.title: Not as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Disliked color (medium brown). I have bought this very same item several times before in medium brown and color was much lighter than this most recent purchase. This purchase of medium brown was almost BLACK! My daughter has purchased the same product recently in light brown which is perfect for her hair and would be for my hair color (we have the same hair color).
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Sammons

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for thin hair!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! I over processed my hair. I had thinning on the sides and top. It’s super easy to apply. Blend in with a comb. I don’t see this working on a shiny bald head. But for thinning areas you can blend this naturally.
customer_reviews.author: crystallee

customer_reviews.title: Great for thinning hair!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! It thickens hair and will slightly change the color depending on how much you use. Just get the color closest to your hair color. Use a darker color for roots, if that’s what you want. I have ordered this three times, not always from amazon. Just love it for thinning hair!
customer_reviews.author: Sally L Cowgill

customer_reviews.title: First time ordering and will repeat
customer_reviews.text: I've used and purchased many different brands of this type of product on amazon. Some other brands are too thick and heavy, but not this one. Xfusion is very light and goes on easily. Excellent coverage. I will be ordering more and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sliderguy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color is good but fibers do not cling to hair all that good. Workable however
customer_reviews.author: PeaceJoy

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Imitation
customer_reviews.text: This is half the price of Cabooki or Toppik for a reason, in my opinion. I found it to be half the quality and strongly recommend the investment in Cabooki or Toppik if you want a product that lasts longer, looks more natural, and covers better.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Who needs Hair Club for Men when you have this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good it really covers your bald spots and really stays on your hair the whole day the only issue I have is when I sweat and I'm out in the Sun my hair looks green I never noticed it until people started pointing it out to me and that's for the medium brown so what I do now if I mix the medium brown with the dark brown
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Don't be an idiot and shake the canister though. I had zero issues applying it. I put it close to my scalp and tapped the end vs shaking it like a salt shaker. It will get everywhere if you carelessly apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Holy

customer_reviews.title: Trichotillomania warriors, please READ! I've searched for ways ...
customer_reviews.text: Trichotillomania warriors, please READ! I've searched for ways to cover my damage, and ways to prevent myself from pulling. This is it! There's a color to match nearly any hair color, it hides the spots so flawlessly and naturally, and what's been helping me the most is if my hands wander up to start to pull, I end up with the residue all over my fingers and under my nails, so then I spend the time getting that out from under them and cleaning my hands instead of pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lee

customer_reviews.title: OMG! I LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than sprays or other products that cover up roots that need touching up. It lasts until next shampoo. Doesn't come off on pillows etc. And it looks really natural! It's just great!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good keratin hair fibers
customer_reviews.text: XFusion if the same product as Toppik at a lower price. Very few keratin fibers come in gray, and this matches my salt and pepper hair perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: A Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently in my early 30's and ever since my mid 20's my hair has thinned quite a bit. I went to different dermatologists and the answer was always the same: genetics. So, in lieu of some freaky hair transplant, I use hair fibers in my daily routine. It is not at all messy and not only does this stuff easily cover the spots where my scalp is visible (I'm very pale with very dark hair - bad combination), it also does a fantastic job of giving some additional body to my hair. One bottle of this lasts a good 3+ months, and it only adds on like, 45 seconds to my routine each morning. I highly recommend this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Leigh

customer_reviews.title: it's okay but I've used better methods
customer_reviews.text: This does the trick when your roots first start to show. I bought the trial size to see if I'd like it. As my roots grew in further (more than 1/4 inch) , it was difficult to get this product to cover all the regrowth. Not sure if it's how I'm applying it or if it's the product itself. I'm 100% gray and unless I conceal the regrowth I start to look as if I'm thinning along my partline. I've had more success with root touch-up that is applied with a brush, similar to eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: TigrLilly

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok product but they've jacked the price up too much so I've discontinue using their brand. Was a good alternative to their other brand Toppik when that got too expensive. Have gone to Luxe now which is fine. If they don't want to keep prices competitive there are other options just as good.
customer_reviews.author: ultrasonic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these hair fibers for some time and will continue to do so. I no no longer color my hair so really like that you have both gray and white fibers available. My hair is now a mixture of the two so combining these two colors works beautifully. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: as i would like to have it back
customer_reviews.text: This helps me as a women who is use to thick hair and due to stress and hormones my hair has thinned. It's not my hair, as i would like to have it back, but it helps to give the appearance of hair you don't have and I'm happy there a products like this one.
customer_reviews.author: kathy b

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product did not do as presented. Even the added coloring was invisible ! I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have a thinning crown and my natural hair color is auburn and this works wonderful. Cant see scalp now and cant tell I have put this product in my hair. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been using this product for years
customer_reviews.text: The color matches my hair color and my thinning hair perks up. I;ve tried other products. This one works for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Forte

customer_reviews.title: Best product I own hands down
customer_reviews.text: This was a life-changer for me. I started losing my hair in my twenties. This gives me so much more confidence and put on correctly it is so natural looking. It lasts a long time for me, I simply shake It on my head not unlike a salt shaker, but I tap my head gently each time. It really helps with the control in exactly where I want it. I go very light near my hairline as not to look over done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved my ego. As a woman losing my hair, this product has been a life saver. I spray it into the visible gaps where normally you would see my scalp, it now looks like I have hair again
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: No Hat, No Wig
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I have very thin hair following Chemo. This gives my hair a full appearance. It is easy to use and lasts with maybe a slight touch up until it is washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff. After having my daughter (15 months ago) my hair is still splotchy and embarrassing. I'm a waitress so before using this, it was obvious. The knob that you see in the photo comes separate but a total must! It spreads the keratin fibers evenly. I use the color Medium Brown.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ise
customer_reviews.text: It about the size or a deodorant. Much smaller than expected but it seems to last. I works fine. My girlfriends notice my hair looks better. Easy to use doesn’t leave any residue on my white pillows
customer_reviews.author: Jo W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hair filler. Lasts a week if you spray it once.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It takes a little practice to get the application correct, but after that it is a great product. Give the appearance of fuller hair which is great for those of us with lighter and finer hair.
customer_reviews.author: JW Musser

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. Color match is difficult. Blond is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Color match is difficult. Blond is too light and Medium blond is too dark. Wish they had more color options.

product_meta.title: XFusion by Toppik, Keratin Hair Fibers. 0.11 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Size:0.98 Ounce| Color:Dark Brown Level 3XFusion Keratin Fibers, made of colored keratin protein, blend undetectably with existing hair strands to instantly create the appearance of naturally thick, full hair. XFusion Keratin Fibers resist wind, rain, and perspiration for long-lasting results in all conditions. Available in nine shades that can be mixed to match any hair color, Keratin Fibers work for all hair types and textures. Also great for part lines, covering extension tracks and touching up roots between hair color appointments. Easily washes out with shampoo.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
